name: x4m.github.io
body:
## Hello world
I'm software developer from Yekaterinburg, Russia.
I've been in business development for a long time, particularly developing database indexing subsystems for multidimensional OLAP data. Accidentally I've done PhD and some science papers about it. It's cool problem, but I believe it's not close to be solved.
***
My personal motto is "Consumption for creation; energy for creation". I have no clue what does it means or where had I heard it. I'm not sure it have any sense. But I hear it everywhere in every whisper of a world.
It's not about leaving the trail, it's about sparking motion. Lasting motion. Complex motion. Reflection motion. Self-aware motion.
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
